response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds significant value for us and is tailored to meet your needs. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you at a special price of $11,500. This represents a remarkable opportunity for both parties, ensuring that you receive a high-quality item at a competitive rate while allowing me to maximize the value of my investment. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 11500}
